TopicTitle: How to revert KSP to 1.14.3 for the KVV mod

Articles.Content: I installed the KVV (Kronal Vessel Viewer) and it wasn't supported in the newest version of KSP (1.14.5). It said is was only supported on 1.14.3. Is there a way I can revert the Steam version of KSP to this version?

Welcome to the forums @ItsAslan!

Can you elaborate on your issue? The latest version of KSP is 1.11.2

Even Kronal Vessel Viewer Continued is only up to game version 1.9.1 and the original didn't get past 1.0.4 . Either you are confusing your mods or where ever you got it from is not the real thing. Iike Spiff said. the public are only up to 1.11.2 and from what has been said we won't be going past a 1.12......

KVV Continued works perfectly fine in KSP 1.11.2, I’ve used it several times with no issues. And while we’re on the subject- don’t install mods in the Steam copy of KSP, Steam likes to meddle with stuff and can corrupt mods causing he game to crash. Instead, copy KSP from steam/steamapps/common and paste it somewhere else, then put your mods in the copy.

To change your KSP version in Steam:

  1. Right click KSP in your Steam library and click Properties,
  2. Click the Betas tab.
  3. Pick whatever version of KSP you want and it should automatically install.
